ActivityPattern.Description: A lien check must be performed prior to making any payment of $500 or more to a third-party liability claimant in MA. This requirement does not apply to first-party claims, workers comp, claims for damage to or loss of real property, or payments made to a doctor under Med Pay. No more than 10 days before issuing a qualifying payment, please contact P&CClaimsCompliance@gaig.com to perform the lien check.
ActivityPattern.Subject: MA - Mandatory Lien Check
